reviewText: my 3 year old watches this over and over

We are huge fans of Truck Tunes 1 & 2. We discovered the videos on YouTube but like the DVDs for watching on the large screen TV. The songs are clever and fun. The video has great details about what the trucks do when they are working. It's a very well thought out set of truck songs & music videos.
My 2-year old loves both Truck Tunes DVDs!
If your child loves construction vehicles, they will love these songs. The songs are all on YouTube but we got the DVDs so the boys can watch them in the car.

We loved truck tunes and truck tunes 2 is even better. My 4 year old daughter loves it and my 2 year old son goes nuts as soon as he hears the opening sounds. My 4 year old names all the trucks we drive by and the tunes are so catchy that I don't mind watching it over and over. I wish these guys would make other educational videos that are as catchy!
My 4 year old sons favorite! He's loved it for over a year now & watches it over & over. He now identifies all kinds of trucks & tractors as we drive around.
Grandson loves it.
You might have the songs stuck in your head for the rest of your like but your toddler or child will love to watch this video.
My 4 year old loves it!

Absolutely love this! We bought this for our two boys (2 and 4) for Christmas and they can't get enough! We're big fans of the first Truck Tunes and this one does not disappoint! Catchy songs and lots of truck information. Win-win! Great gift for the truck lover in your life!
Super cute, clever and catchy tunes. My son can not get enough of these songs.
Excellent!
grandson loves it!
kids of ages 2 and 5 love them!!
Grandbabies love this
Grandson is addicted, he is 2, what more can I say?
My grandson loves this!

My toddler is obsessed with trucks right now.  So many truck videos have horrible videography and/or cheesy characters.  Not Truck Tunes!  These videos are hands-down my favorites!  The music is catchy and it is very informative!
My son loves truck tunes.  He knows all the songs by heart.  We will be getting truck tunes 3 soon
My son loved it
Toddler loves it, I hate it. But that's pretty normal for kid shows.
My truck obsessed toddler totally loves this.
My 2-year old son always asks for "blue one" (he identifies the truck tunes DVDs as green one, blue one, or orange one).
Not quite as good as it predecessor, but our kids still thoroughly enjoyed it. Definitely recommended for the truck-crazy kid.
My husband and I know every song on these videos. My son is obsessed.
Fun, adult friendly tunes.  But Truck Tunes 1 is better.
We've been watching these videos on Nana's phone for months. How nice it is to see them on the big screen...complete with lyrics to sing along together.
LOVE LOVE LOVE Twenty Trucks! We have both 1 and 2. Thes songs are catchy and stick with you.

If you have a child that loves trucks, buy this!! My 3 1/2 year old son is obsessed with it as well as the first Truck Tunes. The songs are cute, and he loves watching the trucks at work. Beware, the songs are catchy and you may find yourself singing these to yourself on repeat all day.

Great video my boys love it.  The only complaint is the part where my little boys have been watching this catchy video 500 times a day and I now sing the dump truck song in my sleep.  But they love it, so I will endure.  Great video for boys.
16-month old loves it.
These videos are fabulous! Buy them for your kids and grandkids - they are educational and fun - the kids love them!
My just 3yr old grandson loves watching the big machines at work but not too keen on the singing (the words are not very clear).
Great songs and video!
my son is obsessed with this DVD, the songs are catchy and he loves the real life footage of his favorite vehicles.
Our 22 month grandson loves it

My toddler absolutely loves watching this and requests it nearly every day..  The video is simple, straight forward, and great for kids to watch their favorite trucks to catchy music (warning to adults, the tunes may get stuck in your head and have you singing for days afterwards, but my toddler loves it).
The songs are super catchy and my son loves the truck videos!
My 2 year old LOVES the trucks and songs on this video-- more than the first one. Its been a lot of fun watching and singing with him.
My son loves this. It's songs are catchy. Don't mind it when he wants to watch it over and over again.
